name: Page Health-O-Meter
author: Brainpulse Technologies Pvt. Ltd.

sections.description:
Health-o-meter is a tool to help webmasters and SEO experts to take a closer look at on-page optimization and internal linking of a website to see exactly how strong or weak a page is on a website.

Major features in Page Health-O-Meter include:

Page health-o-meter is an SEO plugin developed by a team of web developers and search engine optimization professionals at Brainpulse Technologies. The plugin gives webmasters deeper insight into how links are spread and interconnected across the pages.
When installed and activated, plugin appears at the bottom of each page with three consecutive tabs namely- Incoming Links, Link Prospecting and Page Strength Review.
Admins are required to run each task separately to get the comprehensive insights.

A quick look at the tabs:

Incoming Links:

This is the first tab in the Page health-o-meter dashboard. When run (suppose- on Page A), it thoroughly checks the entire website and lists URLs of the web pages that contain links pointing to Page A.

Link Prospecting:

This is the second tab in the Page health-o-meter dashboard. When run (suppose- on Page A), it checks for the anchor texts, money keywords and other prospect keywords on the page (Page A), that could be linked to the other pages within the site.

Page Strength

This is the third tab in Page health-o-meter dashboard. When run on a page (Suppose- on Page A) the plugin checks for the page strength of those pages that have links pointing to Page A. It gives admins an insight into how those linked pages are interconnected and how they pass link juice to the primary page.
sections.installation:
1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Page Health-O-Meter’
  3. Activate Page Health-O-Meter from your Plugins page.
  4. Go to “Settings->Page Health-O-Meter”.
sections.faq: You’ll find answers to many of your questions on brainpulse.com.
